==Thoughts==
{{All Schemes to Know Explanation|name=Gauhar}}
{{Dialogue start}}
:{{A|VO Gauhar All Schemes to Know 01.ogg}} '''Gauhar:''' (Why can't everyone just be like me, and do things according to the rules?)
{{Dialogue end}}

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Gauhar:''' Hello. Only transactions within the limits of regulations can be made here.
:{{DIcon}} Within the limits...
::'''Gauhar:''' Yes, the contents must be sorted in accordance with the regulations, and the process must also follow regulations.
::'''Gauhar:''' Registration, inspection, approval, contracts, secondary approval... Not one step can be skipped.
::'''Gauhar:''' If any part of the process is not followed, you have to face the consequences at your own risk.
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Gauhar:''' See you.
{{Dialogue end}}
